name: Campfire RSVP
description: A social planning app for coordinating events with friends. Designed and built end-to-end as a cross-platform experience, including UI, backend integration, and real-time coordination flows.

name: Dockly
description: A personal product and progressive web app for discovering and contributing safe bike lock stations. Built with performance, accessibility, and offline-first usage in mind.
focus: PWA capabilities, maps UX, API composition

name: WeatherTracks
description: A web application that curates Spotify playlists based on local weather conditions. Built as a focused experiment in API integration, responsive UI, and frontend polish.
focus: API orchestration, user delight, rapid iteration
